## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT4G27490](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT4G27490)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>RRP41L</u>
- **Gene Name:** RRP41 like
- **Description:**   3-5-exoribonuclease family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2124024
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
